      • readFileWithFramework

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Request> readFileWithFramework(java.lang.String inputDirectory,
                                                                  java.lang.String outputDirectory,
                                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Function that will read from the files, transform the data in Request objects and finally move the treated file to other directory
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - is the directory where the new files will appear
        outputDirectory - is the directory where the files already readed will be moved to
        files - is the array with the name of the files found in the input directory
        Returns:
        return an array of Request objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processFiles

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Request> processFiles(java.lang.String inputDirectory,
                                                         java.lang.String outputDirectory)
        Function that calls the function that is always looking for new files in the directory and the function that will read and move those files

        inputDirectory - is the directory where the new files will appear
        outputDirectory - is the directory where the readed files will be moved to
        Returns:
        returns the list of the requests that were in the files

        Parameters:

        Returns:
